content:
What version?

Do you have crash IDs listed for the crashes you submitted? They would be listed in Help > Troubleshooting Information.
creator: wsmwk

content:
First, install Provider for CalDAV & CardDAV, then launch TbSync, Account Actions, Add new account, CalDAV & Card DAV, select the Yahoo server profile, click Next, and follow the instructions to enter the account address and an app password.

If you have multiple calendars visible, the events from all of them are shown in the same calendar tab.
creator: sfhowes
